data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barone, Mariana L., Werenkraut, Victoria, Ramírez, Martín J. (2016): New species and phylogenetic relationships of the spider genus Coptoprepes using morphological and sequence data (Araneae: Anyphaenidae). Zootaxa 4175 (5): 436-448, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4175.5.2|16 occurrences
